## JsonRpcProvider.readObj() method

reads ipld nodes referenced by the specified CID from chain blockstore and returns raw bytes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readObj(cid: Cid): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cid | Cid |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;
